text:
──Here, Sakuya.
Today's batch of fan letters that came in the gift box.
I've finished checking them, so you can take them home.

Hehe, thank you.
Now I have something to look forward to at home...!

(Sakuya always looks so happy when she gets these,
even though she should be used to it by now──)

<line-height=80%><size=80%>They chose the stationery, thought about what to write, and then wrote it──
they took the time and effort to send their feelings to me.
There's no way I wouldn't be happy!
